gmdh package¶

Module contents¶

gmdh.time_series_transformation(x, lags)¶

Method for transformations of time series!

Examples

>>> x, y = gmdh.time_series_transformation([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6], lags=3)
>>> x
array([[1., 2., 3.],
       [2., 3., 4.],
       [3., 4., 5.]])

gmdh
